ComicInfo.Title: ["That was your famous bouillabaseball dipsey-doodle corkscrew curveball, ALF?"]
ComicInfo.Summary: On his own in the woods after leaving the Tanners, ALF helps take care of a family of beavers in "Babe In the Woods – Part 2." Then ALF tells Lynn about the time on Melmac when he had to guard a V.I.D. – Very Important Diva in "A Night at the I-Hopera." And in "I'd Like to Buy a Vowel," ALF loses the ability to speak vowels and has trouble communicating with the Tanners.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-11 20:38:28. [CVDB56918]
ComicInfo.Characters: ALF, Brian Tanner, Eric Tanner, Kate Tanner, Lucky, Lynn Tanner, Trevor Ochmonek, Willie Tanner
